greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of real {0,1} n X n matrices having determinant=1.
link: Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, (0,1)-Matrix. Section in World of Mathematics.
Index entries for sequences related to binary matrices
mathematica: a[n_] := Module[{M, iter, cnt = 0}, M = Table[a[i, j], {i, 1, n}, {j, 1, n}]; iter = Thread[{Flatten[M], 0, 1}]; Do[If[Det[M] == 1, cnt++], Evaluate[Sequence @@ iter]]; cnt];
results.author: _Hugo Pfoertner_, Oct 05 2003
